Walt Disney World Swan Hotel

mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Walt Disney World® Swan Resort Hotel is a 12-story, 615,000-SF hotel and convention complex featuring over 750 guestrooms, a 23,000-SF ballroom, meeting rooms, restaurants, shop, and recreational facilities. The Swan is organized around a landscaped courtyard defined by two wings of guestrooms, which project into the surrounding crescent-shaped lake across from the companion Walt Disney World® Dolphin Resort Hotel Throughout the interiors, MGA utilized pop art graphics, colors and details reminiscent of the Florida coast to create a thematic context consistent with Disney’s mandate that even the architecture should entertain guests of all ages. -- http://www.michaelgraves.com/architecture/project/walt-disney-world-swan-resort-hotel.html [work]
